attributes.action: Promote Healthy wellbeing and Mental Health in High schools
attributes.background: The levels of depression and anxiety are on the rise in our current society. Social media has added to the stress and wellbring of young minds as awell as educational pressure. Wellness of mind and stess management should be a priority to prevent mental heath decline before they reach adult hood

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
